Browse the source code of qtbase-6.5.0/src/3rdparty/harfbuzz-ng/src/OT/glyf/SubsetGlyph.hh

1#ifndef OT_GLYF_SUBSETGLYPH_HH
2#define OT_GLYF_SUBSETGLYPH_HH
3
4
5#include "../../hb-open-type.hh"
6
7
8namespace OT {
9
10struct glyf_accelerator_t;
11
12namespace glyf_impl {
13
14
15struct SubsetGlyph
16{
17 hb_codepoint_t old_gid;
18 Glyph source_glyph;
19 hb_bytes_t dest_start; /* region of source_glyph to copy first */
20 hb_bytes_t dest_end; /* region of source_glyph to copy second */
21
22 bool serialize (hb_serialize_context_t *c,
23 bool use_short_loca,
24 const hb_subset_plan_t *plan)
25 {
26 TRACE_SERIALIZE (this);
27
28 hb_bytes_t dest_glyph = dest_start.copy (c);
29 dest_glyph = hb_bytes_t (&dest_glyph, dest_glyph.length + dest_end.copy (c).length);
30 unsigned int pad_length = use_short_loca ? padding () : 0;
31 DEBUG_MSG (SUBSET, nullptr, "serialize %u byte glyph, width %u pad %u", dest_glyph.length, dest_glyph.length + pad_length, pad_length);
32
33 HBUINT8 pad;
34 pad = 0;
35 while (pad_length > 0)
36 {
37 c->embed (obj: pad);
38 pad_length--;
39 }
40
41 if (unlikely (!dest_glyph.length)) return_trace (true);
42
43 /* update components gids */
44 for (auto &_ : Glyph (dest_glyph).get_composite_iterator ())
45 {
46 hb_codepoint_t new_gid;
47 if (plan->new_gid_for_old_gid (old_gid: _.get_gid(), new_gid: &new_gid))
48 const_cast<CompositeGlyphRecord &> (_).set_gid (new_gid);
49 }
50
51 if (plan->flags & HB_SUBSET_FLAGS_NO_HINTING)
52 Glyph (dest_glyph).drop_hints ();
53
54 if (plan->flags & HB_SUBSET_FLAGS_SET_OVERLAPS_FLAG)
55 Glyph (dest_glyph).set_overlaps_flag ();
56
57 return_trace (true);
58 }
59
60 bool compile_bytes_with_deltas (const hb_subset_plan_t *plan,
61 hb_font_t *font,
62 const glyf_accelerator_t &glyf)
63 { return source_glyph.compile_bytes_with_deltas (plan, font, glyf, dest_start, dest_end); }
64
65 void free_compiled_bytes ()
66 {
67 dest_start.fini ();
68 dest_end.fini ();
69 }
70
71 void drop_hints_bytes ()
72 { source_glyph.drop_hints_bytes (dest_start, dest_end); }
73
74 unsigned int length () const { return dest_start.length + dest_end.length; }
75 /* pad to 2 to ensure 2-byte loca will be ok */
76 unsigned int padding () const { return length () % 2; }
77 unsigned int padded_size () const { return length () + padding (); }
78};
79
80
81} /* namespace glyf_impl */
82} /* namespace OT */
83
84
85#endif /* OT_GLYF_SUBSETGLYPH_HH */
86
